context_history.content: I want to learn about: ncc. DO NOT greet me. Immediately start lesson Step 1 by explaining the core concept on the whiteboard.

The Neural Correlates of Consciousness (NCC) are defined as the minimal set of neuronal events and mechanisms sufficient for a specific conscious percept. It is the search for the 'biological footprint' that must occur in the brain for you to have a subjective experience.
